author: Correio Braziliense
title: EUA confirmam 1Âº caso grave de gripe aviÃ¡ria em um humano
text:
O primeiro caso grave de gripe aviÃ¡ria em humano foi detectado nos Estados Unidos . Segundo informaÃ§Ãµes do Centro de Controle e PrevenÃ§Ã£o de DoenÃ§as (CDC) local, o paciente foi hospitalizado apÃ³s apresentar complicaÃ§Ãµes da doenÃ§a. AtÃ© o momento, as autoridades registram um total de 61 casos no paÃ­s, mas todos os outros foram leves.
LEIA MAIS: The New York Times destaca â€˜Ainda Estou Aquiâ€™ entre apostas ao Oscar de Melhor Filme;
Ainda conforme o CDC, o novo paciente se expÃ´s a aves doentes e mortas em uma fazenda. Os detalhes do caso, confirmado na Ãºltima sexta-feira, nÃ£o foram divulgados, e o prognÃ³stico Ã© desconhecido. O sequenciamento genÃ©tico revelou que o vÃ­rus H5N1 do doente faz parte do genÃ³tipo D1.1, detectado recentemente em aves selvagens e domÃ©sticas nos Estados Unidos.
A cepa Ã© a mesma encontrada em pessoas no estado de Washington, tambÃ©m nos Estados Unidos, e na provÃ­ncia canadense da ColÃºmbia BritÃ¢nica. O genÃ³tipo D1.1 Ã© diferente do B3.13, que foi identificado em vacas-leiteiras e causou alguns surtos em aves e humanos com sintomas leves, como conjuntivite. AtÃ© o momento nÃ£o foi detectado nenhum caso de transmissÃ£o entre humanos.
PreocupaÃ§Ã£o Conforme Marli Sasaki, infectologista do Hospital do Servidor PÃºblico Estadual, em SÃ£o Paulo, a possibilidade de o vÃ­rus sofrer mutaÃ§Ãµes que permitam a transmissÃ£o eficiente entre humanos Ã© uma preocupaÃ§Ã£o crescente.
â€œEssas alteraÃ§Ãµes poderiam ocorrer com a infecÃ§Ã£o de mamÃ­feros, como vacas e outros animais, aumentando as chances deo patÃ³geno adquirir caracterÃ­sticas que facilitem a transmissÃ£o para humanos. Ã‰ importante ressaltar que a resistÃªncia emergente aos antivirais, juntamente com o desenvolvimento ainda em fase inicial de vacinas eficazes contra o vÃ­rus H5N1, agrava a preocupaÃ§Ã£o de uma possÃ­vel pandemia, por isso a necessidade de vigilÃ¢ncia contÃ­nua em todos os setoresâ€, ressaltou Sasaki.
Segundo Thiago Morbi, infectologista do Hospital alemÃ£o Oswaldo Cruz, em SÃ£o Paulo, dados da OrganizaÃ§Ã£o Mundial da SaÃºde mostram que, desde 2003, foram registrados 874 casos humanos de gripe aviÃ¡ria, com 458 Ã³bitos. â€œÃ‰ uma doenÃ§a com alta taxa de letalidade. Os sintomas iniciais geralmente incluem febre alta, tosse e dor de garganta, mas podem evoluir rapidamente para uma pneumonia grave e atÃ© mesmo para o Ã³bito. Precisamos monitorar, e Ã© isso que as instituiÃ§Ãµes de saÃºde estÃ£o fazendo por meio da vigilÃ¢ncia desses casos. Em algum momento, o vÃ­rus pode sofrer uma mutaÃ§Ã£o, se isso acontecer, devemos estar preparados para adotar medidas que minimizem a transmissÃ£o e evitem a disseminaÃ§Ã£o do vÃ­rus.â€

author: ondaceroes | agencias
title: Fin de semana soleado con casi 25 grados en el MediterrÃ¡neo
text:
El tiempo de este fin de semana serÃ¡ estable y soleado en la mayor parte del paÃ­s, aunque habrÃ¡ lluvias el noroeste peninsular por la borrasca HipÃ³lito, y las temperaturas subirÃ¡n en amplias zonas hasta acercarse a los 25 grados en el Ã¡rea mediterrÃ¡nea y Canarias.
La predicciÃ³n de la Agencia Estatal de MeteorologÃ­a (Aemet), recogida por Servimedia, indica que el sol ganarÃ¡ terreno en amplios lugares de EspaÃ±a y las temperaturas diurnas estarÃ¡n este domingo entre 5 y 10 grados por encima de lo normal en la mayor parte de la mitad sur peninsular y de Canarias.
No obstante, el sÃ¡bado habrÃ¡ menos de 10 grados solo en zonas de la Meseta Norte y de lugares montaÃ±osos y el domingo esas Ã¡reas se restringirÃ¡n a la Cordillera CantÃ¡brica y Pirineos.
LeÃ³n serÃ¡ la capital de provincia mÃ¡s frÃ­a, con cinco grados como mucho este viernes, siete el sÃ¡bado y nueve el domingo.
En la penÃ­nsula, harÃ¡ mÃ¡s calor el viernes en Sevilla (19), el sÃ¡bado en Granada (20) y el domingo en Valencia (24).
QuÃ© tiempo harÃ¡ el sÃ¡bado
Este sÃ¡bado, segÃºn Torres, "se prevÃ© la entrada por el noroeste peninsular de este frente atlÃ¡ntico asociado a la borrasca HipÃ³lito", con lo que aumentarÃ¡ la nubosidad y lloverÃ¡ en el cuadrante noroeste, sobre todo en Galicia y zonas aledaÃ±as.
Las nubes se quedarÃ¡n en las islas occidentales de Canarias y no se descartan nieblas matinales en Albacete, las depresiones del nordeste y el litoral de Girona, asÃ­ como calima en las islas orientales del archipiÃ©lago canario.
Hay una baja probabilidad de nieve, con la cota subiendo a entre 1.600 y 2.000 metros en la Cordillera CantÃ¡brica occidental, y de 1.800 a 2.000 en el macizo galaico-leonÃ©s, y situada entre 1.600 y 2.000 metros en Gredos.
Las temperaturas subirÃ¡n en gran parte de la penÃ­nsula, de forma notable en zonas montaÃ±osas del centro y el sureste. Canarias tendrÃ¡ valores muy altos para la Ã©poca del aÃ±o.
De madrugada, las heladas se reducirÃ¡n a la mayor parte de la mitad norte peninsular. De dÃ­a, habrÃ¡ menos de 10 grados solo en zonas de montaÃ±a y la Meseta Norte, y mÃ¡s de 20 en puntos de los valles del Guadalquivir y el Guadiana, asÃ­ como el interior de la Comunidad Valenciana.
El frÃ­o se notarÃ¡ mÃ¡s en LeÃ³n (7), LogroÃ±o y Zamora (8), y Lleida (9), y el calor se sentirÃ¡ especialmente en Las Palmas de Gran Canaria y Santa Cruz de Tenerife (24), Granada (20) y CÃ¡diz, Ceuta, CÃ³rdoba, Melilla, Murcia, Sevilla y Valencia (18).
Nubosidad a partir del domingo por la borrasca HipÃ³lito
En cuanto al domingo, el frente de la borrasca HipÃ³lito, poco activo, llevarÃ¡ abundante nubosidad de oeste a este y dejarÃ¡ lluvias dÃ©biles, dispersas y ocasionales en la mitad noroeste de la penÃ­nsula. SerÃ¡n mÃ¡s abundantes en el oeste de Galicia, donde podrÃ­an ir acompaÃ±adas de alguna tormenta.
En el Ã¡rea mediterrÃ¡nea habrÃ¡ nubes medias y altas, y no se descarta alguna lluvia en zonas de la costa catalana y valenciana. Canarias tendrÃ¡ nubes altas e intervalos nubosos en las islas occidentales, sin descartar alguna precipitaciÃ³n dÃ©bil.
Son probables brumas y nieblas posfrontales en la mitad noroeste, mÃ¡s persistentes en montaÃ±as, y seguirÃ¡ la calima en las islas orientales de Canarias.
ContinuarÃ¡ la baja probabilidad de nieve, que podrÃ­a aparecer en cotas superiores a 2.000 metros en Pirineos.
Las temperaturas aumentarÃ¡n tanto de madrugada (con heladas restringidas a Pirineos y depresiones del nordeste) como de dÃ­a en la mayor parte de la penÃ­nsula. Solo la Cordillera CantÃ¡brica y el Ã¡rea pirenaica estarÃ¡n por debajo de los 10 grados, mientras que habrÃ¡ mÃ¡s de 20 en AndalucÃ­a y el resto del MediterrÃ¡neo.
El frÃ­o irÃ¡ menos y se sentirÃ¡ mÃ¡s en LeÃ³n (9), Burgos (11) y Guadalajara, Madrid, Palencia y Valladolid (11). En cambio, calentarÃ¡ sobre todo en Las Palmas de Gran Canaria y Santa Cruz de Tenerife (25), Valencia (24) y CastellÃ³n de la Plana y Murcia (23).
Â¿Y la prÃ³xima semana?
Respecto a la prÃ³xima semana, es probable que continÃºe con el paso de frentes y abundante nubosidad, mientras que al final se estabilizarÃ¡.
Las lluvias serÃ¡n probables en gran parte del territorio, salvo el extremo oriental peninsular y Baleares. SerÃ¡n mÃ¡s abundantes en el tercio occidental y nevarÃ¡ en Pirineos y otras montaÃ±as del norte y del sudeste.
Las temperaturas subirÃ¡n al inicio de la semana y bajarÃ¡n despuÃ©s. Las heladas nocturnas, restringidas a Pirineos al inicio, ganarÃ¡n extensiÃ³n e intensidad gradualmente hasta afectar al final a gran parte de la mitad norte y del sudeste de la penÃ­nsula.
MÃ¡s Noticias
Nueve seÃ±ales que ayudan a identificar la depresiÃ³n en menores de edad, segÃºn los expertos AsÃ­ es 'Pirola', la nueva variante de covid: estos son sus sÃ­ntomas Pedro SÃ¡nchez reÃºne a sus ministros en una jornada de convivencia Novedades en el caso Marta del Castillo: el mÃ³vil de CarcaÃ±o registra seis movimientos el dÃ­a del crimen CuÃ¡nto cotiza el subsidio para mayores de 52 aÃ±os a la jubilaciÃ³n
Canarias tendrÃ¡ intervalos nubosos, con lluvias en todo el archipiÃ©lago, mÃ¡s probables en las islas montaÃ±osas, y mÃ¡s abundantes al principio de la semana. Las temperaturas apenas cambiarÃ¡n.

author: Anurag Batham
title: â€œIt had no character development at allâ€: Dragon Ball: Sparking Zeroâ€™s Lack of One Sagaâ€™s Characters at Launch May Be a Reflection of Fan Criticism
text:
For some, Dragon Ball GT appears to be a fun story that emerged out of the minds of Toei Animation staff. But many are in disagreement, especially the fans in Japan. However, the characters from the series did quite well in the video game adaptations of the game.
The black sheep of the Dragon Ball family is likely to see its characters making it to the upcoming Bandai Namco game. Thatâ€™s because its predecessor had them too, and several other video game adaptations of the series had featured them before.
GT Characters Might Not be a Fan Favorite for the Upcoming Game at All â›¶ â›¶ â›¶ â›¶ â›¶ Ã— After witnessing a recent conversation regarding inclusion of GT characters in Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero , it seems like some fans arenâ€™t really into characters from the anime-exclusive series.
In one recent community debate on social media platform X (formerly Twitter), the poster asked if they wanted to see GT characters or the original animeâ€™s.
Letâ€™s debate: Who should be more of a priority to be in Sparking Zero?
OG Dragon Ball or GT pic.twitter.com/fA3CR1JvrH
â€” JJ ðŸ˜ˆ (@KingJordan_57) August 18, 2024 Expand Tweet The answer to that was pretty clear, as these Dragon Ball fans came together emphasizing the original series.
GT was terrible until the end, it had no character development at all and super Saiyan 4 was over hyped lol
â€” Kyle McCoy (@KyleMcC58703479) August 22, 2024 Expand Tweet While the original series is definitely something to consider, GT does have its charm thatâ€™ll make fans love it.
Not GT Fans Want to See Characters from the Original Dragon Ball Dragon Ball GT wasnâ€™t as popular in Japan as in the USA. Credits: Bandai Namco If not GT , these fans were seen showering their love for the characters from the original series.
Even if I played GT Characters more back then itâ€™s still OG DB. That is a CRUCIAL part of dragon ball. Without DB, there is no DBZ and DBS and people donâ€™t get ts cuz most people havenâ€™t watched the original(hell Iâ€™m watching it rn).
They honestly need to push OG db way more
â€” Josh (@joshua38x) August 18, 2024 Expand Tweet This one fan believes emphasizing the original animeâ€™s characters would help the game do a lot better.
OG Dragon Ball needs to be in Sparking Zero. OG DB doesn't get enough exposure in the west so actually having a og db arc would do a lot for the fans in the west. Especially if they had most of the great fights like Goku vs Tien 1 and 2, Goku vs Nam, Goku vs Tao, etc
â€” Lord Von (@TheEmperor_Von) August 19, 2024 Expand Tweet February 26, 1986, was the day we saw Dragon Ball characters come to life. From Emperor Pilaf Saga to Piccolo Junior Saga, it was a delight to watch.
RELATED â€œGOKU COSTUMES IN SPARKING ZERO LOOKING CLEANâ€: New Yardrat & Saiyan Armor Shown Off For Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO Z fighters like Goku, Tien, and Piccolo originally belonged to that era. Interestingly, both of them, and Yamcha, first appeared as Son Gokuâ€™s enemies.
Some fans were recently seen talking about certain outfits that could add more salt to the game . If characters from the original series make it to the Spike Chunsoft game, it would be great to see outfits like that of Bandit Yamcha.
Do you want to see GT characters coming to the upcoming Bandai Namco game? We would like to know about it in the comments section below.

author: , Florida Today
title: DeSantis declares Florida state of emergency for Gulf storm 97L
text:
Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis declares state of emergency ahead of Gulf storm 'Invest 97L' Florida's governor declared 54 of Florida's 67 counties under a state of emergency. Douglas Soule USA TODAY NETWORK - Florida Show Caption
Hide Caption
Tropical waves explained: How tropical waves affect the weather Tropical waves do not refer to the storm surge waves you see during a tropical storm or a hurricane. It is an entirely meteorological term explaining the beginning phase of tropical storm development. Gov. Ron DeSantis put the vast majority of Florida counties in a state of emergency in preparation for the potential landfall of a storm that could become the first "significant threat" to the state in what is expected to be a violent hurricane season.
"Based on meteorological reports, there is significant threat of heavy rainfal l over most of the State of Florida, with the possibility of at least 12 inches of rainfall over the next seven days," reads the Thursday evening executive order. "The water tables in the affected areas are already nearing peak capacity and incoming heavy rainfall will cause significant river flooding that may last for several weeks."
The counties under a state of emergency : Alachua, Baker, Bay, Bradford, Calhoun, Charlotte, Citrus, Clay, Collier, Columbia, Dixie, Duval, Escambia, Flagler, Franklin, Gadsden, Gilchrist, Gulf, Hamilton, Hernando, Hillsborough, Holmes, Jackson, Jefferson, Lafayette, Lake, Lee, Leon, Levy, Liberty, Madison, Manatee, Marion, Monroe, Nassau, Okaloosa, Orange, Osceola, Pasco, Pinellas, Polk, Putnam, Santa Rosa, Sarasota, Seminole, St. Johns, Sumter, Suwannee, Taylor, Union, Volusia, Wakulla, Walton, and Washington.
No Gouging: : Florida's attorney general activates price gouging hotline ahead of Gulf storm Invest 97L
In a Thursday afternoon advisory , the National Hurricane Center said there's a 70% chance that a well-defined tropical wave â€” designated Invest 97L â€” could develop into a tropical depression in the week near Florida or over the eastern Gulf of Mexico.
The NHC said there's a 30% chance it develops in the next 48 hours.
If the storm does develop into a tropical depression and reaches sustained windspeeds of 39 mph, it would become Tropical Storm Debby .
Declaring a state of emergency allows state and local governments much more freedom to coordinate their emergency agencies, relax restrictions, cut through red tape and reallocate resources to quickly deal with an imminent or ongoing threat that local services can't handle on their own.
This reporting content is supported by a partnership with Freedom Forum and Journalism Funding Partners. USA Today Network-Florida First Amendment reporter Douglas Soule is based in Tallahassee, Fla. He can be reached at DSoule@gannett.com. Twitter: @DouglasSoule .

Twitter

author: Artur Tomala
title: Google Might've Cancelled The Pixel Tablet Already - Tech Advisor
text:
Update: Android Authority is now reporting that the Pixel Tablet 2 will be cancelled, not the Pixel Tablet 3. The Android Headlines article remains unedited. Weâ€™ve updated the headline and description, but the rest of the article below remains unchanged.
The Android tablet market has had its ups and downs lately, and the latest report indicates that Google may be giving up on making its own slates soon.
After years of on-again, off-again interest in the tablet market, the tech giant has reportedly decided to cancel its Pixel Tablet 3, codenamed â€˜Kiyomi,â€™ according to Android Headlines.
The move has sparked speculation about Googleâ€™s future â€“ or lack thereof â€“ in the tablet space. Whatâ€™s more, we recently witnessed the launch of the Galaxy Tab S10 series , which dropped the entry-level model.
Google Pixel Tablet Dominik Tomaszewski / Foundry
Android Headlines reports that the Pixel Tablet 3â€™s development was scrapped just last week, with internal teams informed of the decision shortly thereafter.
Employees assigned to the project have reportedly already been reassigned to other initiatives within Google, signalling a clear shift in the companyâ€™s hardware priorities.
This news follows the 2023 release of the Pixel Tablet , Googleâ€™s first attempt to re-enter the tablet market after a hiatus that began in 2019.
However, the decision to cancel its successor indicates that the Pixel Tablet 2 , slated for release next year, may be Googleâ€™s final foray into tablets for the foreseeable future.
Google Pixel Tablet Dominik Tomaszewski / Foundry
The cancellation of the Pixel Tablet 3 raises questions about Googleâ€™s overall strategy.
It comes hot on the heels of the rumour that the company could combine ChromeOS with Android to make Android tablets a better rival to the iPad .
Android Headlines also reports that Google might be working on the first Pixel Laptop.
This could mark a significant departure from its current hardware roadmap and a concession of the tablet space to competitors.
Google Pixel Tablet Dominik Tomaszewski / Foundry
While Android continues to develop tablet-friendly features, the hardware side of Googleâ€™s tablet ambitions appears to be fizzling out once more.
The Pixel Tablet 2, recently rumoured to include a first-party keyboard case, may now launch under the shadow of being the last of its kind, with no planned successor.
However, this yearâ€™s launch of the Pixel 9 Pro Fold could mean that Google wants to bet on foldable phones that, when opened, resemble tablet. Plus, they often have extra features and are more powerful.
Whether this will turn out to be the case, however, time will tell. In the meantime, be sure to check out what we expect from the upcoming Pixel 10 series next year.
Author: Artur Tomala , Mobile Writer, Tech Advisor Artur is a Mobile Writer at Tech Advisor, where he covers a range of smartphone, tablet and smartwatch-related topics. He has been working in the tech industry since 2021, including time spent leading a team focused on mobile news, reviews and product rankings. As an ambassador for the productivity app Notion, he runs training workshops and creates advanced templates to help people stay organised and productive.
Recent stories by Artur Tomala: How to set up a new Android phone This patent shows that Apple might be working on a foldable device Samsung accidentally confirms the Galaxy Tab S10 FE is coming

author: Caleb Gebrewold
title: Dricus Du Plessis reacts after MMA veteran Yoel Romero praises the South African's fight IQ
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? Dricus Du Plessis reacts after MMA veteran Yoel Romero praises the South African's fight IQ Discuss Now Dricus du Plessis (left) reacts to praise from Yoel Romero (right) [Image credits: Getty Images] Dricus Du Plessis made his return to the octagon last month as he defeated Sean Strickland via unanimous decision at UFC 312 to defend his middleweight title for the second time. While many have questioned 'Stillknocks' fighting style, he has shown an ability to get the job done regardless of his opponent.
Ad The middleweight champion recently earned praise from Yoel Romero . Speaking to Denis Shkuratov of Submission Radio , 'Soldier of God' expressed that he would have liked to face Du Plessis before adding:
"Du Plessis is a very intelilgent guy. I think the most danger for him is intelligence. He's a very intelligent. When he fights, he has a good strategy. The mentality for him is very good." Ad Trending Du Plessis acknowledged the praise on his Instagram story, stating:
Get the latest updates on One Championship Rankings at Sportskeeda and more
"Thank you for the kind words sir @yoelromeromma" Check out Yoel Romero's comments on Dricus Du Plessis and the middleweight champion's response below (starting at the 11:45 mark):
Ad Dricus Du Plessis' response to Yoel Romero While Romero offered praise to the middleweight champion, he added that he is leaning towards Khamzat Chimaev if the pair clash. He noted that the latter has an advantage in wrestling, claiming that 'Borz' is at an Olympic level in that department. 'Soldier of God' believes that he would matchup favorably against the No.3-ranked middleweight if he returned to the UFC .

author: redazione@ilgiornale-web.it (Adalberto Signore)
title: Regionali, Ã¨ stallo nella maggioranza. Giorgia non vuole rinunciare al Veneto
text:
da Roma
Non deve essere andato benissimo il vertice di maggioranza sulle regionali che si Ã¨ tenuto ieri a Palazzo Chigi e a cui Ã¨ seguita una ferrea consegna del silenzio. Rigorosa al punto che anche la maggior parte dei big dei partiti coinvolti sono stati tagliati fuori. Una riunione di un'ora e mezza a cui hanno preso parte Giorgia Meloni, i due vicepremier Antonio Tajani e Matteo Salvini, e il leader di Noi Moderati Maurizio Lupi. Sul tavolo l'intricato rebus delle candidature nelle cinque regioni che andranno alle urne entro fine anno: Campania, Marche, Puglia, Toscana, Valle d'Aosta e Veneto.
L'obiettivo non era certo quello di completare l'intero puzzle in un colpo solo, ma quantomeno di sbloccare le due regioni date per perse e annunciare i candidati governatori in Puglia (Mauro D'Attis di Forza Italia) e Toscana (Alessandro Tomasi di Fdi). Niente. Lo stallo Ã¨ stato totale e ha paralizzato l'intera trattativa. Su cui si tornerÃ  in un nuovo vertice la prossima settimana, forse giÃ  lunedÃ¬.
Magari per allora si saranno diradate le nubi di incertezza che sembrano avvolgere soprattutto il Veneto, vero epicentro di eventuali scosse all'interno della maggioranza. Archiviato il terzo mandato, infatti, l'uscente Luca Zaia dovrÃ  passare la mano. E ancora non Ã¨ chiaro a chi. La Lega rivendica ovviamente il diritto alla successione e Salvini punta su Alberto Stefani. Ma non Ã¨ cosÃ¬ scontato che Meloni sia d'accordo, visto che gli attuali equilibri - 5 governatori di Forza Italia, 4 della Lega, 3 di Fdi - evidentemente non rappresentano gli attuali rapporti di forza nella maggioranza. La premier, dunque, continua a spingere per un candidato del suo partito (i senatori Luca De Carlo o Raffaele Speranzon) o in alternativa per un civico comunque riconducibile a via della Scrofa. Una partita complicata dal fatto che non Ã¨ chiaro cosa voglia Zaia, che comunque in Veneto voti ne sposta parecchi e che continua a evocare la possibilitÃ  di correre con una sua lista. Anche se il fatto che abbia detto pubblicamente che una Lista Zaia puÃ² arrivare addirittura al 45% lascia pensare che la sua sia solo una minaccia. Ãˆ evidente, infatti, che non correndo da governatore e con i candidati consiglieri regionali di Fdi, Lega e Fi in campo, il 45% Ã¨ un obiettivo quasi impossibile anche per il Doge. E, avendolo messo nero su bianco, ora anche un ottimo 30% sarebbe considerata una mezza vittoria.
C'Ã¨ poi la questione di cosa farÃ  in futuro Zaia. Ieri Ã¨ nuovamente circolata l'ipotesi di un valzer di poltrone che porterebbe il ministro dell'Interno Matteo Piantedosi a candidarsi in Campania per lasciare il Viminale a Francesco Lollobrigida che al ministero dell'Agricoltura sarebbe sostituito proprio da Zaia. Uno scenario in veritÃ  poco plausibile per due ragioni. La prima Ã¨ che vincere in Campania per il centrodestra sarÃ  difficile e una sconfitta del ministro dell'Interno rischia di avere ricadute sul governo. La seconda Ã¨ che improbabile che Salvini acconsenta a lasciare il Viminale a Fdi. Non Ã¨ un caso che dal ministero dell'Interno smentiscano in maniera netta: "Come giÃ  detto decine di volte, Piantedosi non ha alcuna intenzione di candidarsi in Campania". Dove alla fine dovrebbe correre il viceministro degli Esteri di Fdi Edmondo Cirielli. Con buona pace di Forza Italia, che - dopo il passo indietro di Fulvio Martusciello a seguito dell'inchiesta Huawei che ha coinvolto la sua segretaria - preferirebbe un civico.
Ãˆ chiaro, infatti, che un candidato governatore di Fdi farebbe da traino di voti per il partito di via della Scrofa a danno anche di Forza Italia.Al momento - nonostante Tajani assicuri che al vertice "non si Ã¨ parlato di regionali" - la quadra sembra essere lontana. Tanto che Meloni alla fine della riunione avrebbe detto "o troviamo un accordo oppure decido io".
netiquette.
Quile norme di comportamento per esteso.

author: Soester Anzeiger
title: Meghan Markles â€žmagische Blumenstreusel" bieten Steilvorlage fÃ¼r lustige Parodien
text:
Meghan Markles â€žmagische Blumenstreuselâ€œ bieten Steilvorlage fÃ¼r lustige Parodien
Mit ihren fragwÃ¼rdigen Lifestyle-Tipps sorgte Meghan Markle zuletzt fÃ¼r hÃ¤mische Kommentare. WÃ¤hrend eines Auftritts verteidigte die Herzogin jetzt unter anderem ihre vielfach kritisierte Blumendeko.
New York â€“ Ihre Netflix-Show â€žWith Love, Meghanâ€œ sollte Meghan Markle (43) eigentlich als Expertin in Lifestyle-Fragen etablieren. Der Versuch ging jedoch ziemlich nach hinten los, denn die Ehefrau von Prinz Harry (40) machte sich mit ihren seltsam anmutenden KÃ¼chentipps in den sozialen Netzwerken zum GespÃ¶tt der Zuschauer. Insbesondere die essbaren getrockneten BlÃ¼ten, die laut Meghan selbst den einfachsten Gerichten einen Gourmet-Anstrich verleihen, fÃ¼hrten im Netz zu zahlreichen Parodien.
Meghans â€žmagische Blumenstreuselâ€œ sorgen fÃ¼r Lacher auf Social Media
Eines steht fest: â€žWith Love, Meghanâ€œ hat die Herzogin von Sussex zweifelsohne wieder einmal ins GesprÃ¤ch gebracht. Seit der VerÃ¶ffentlichung der Netflix-Produktion hÃ¤ufen sich die Satire-Posts auf Instagram, TikTok und Co., wobei vor allem die â€žmagischen Blumenstreuselâ€œ der zweifachen Mutter fÃ¼r KopfschÃ¼tteln sorgen. Bei der fraglichen Essensdeko handelt es sich um getrocknete BlÃ¼ten, die Meghan liebend gerne Ã¼ber RÃ¼hrei, Salate und Joghurtspeisen streut.
Dass sie selbst ganz und gar Ã¼berzeugt von der beeindruckenden Wirkung ihrer essbaren Blumen ist, veranlasste seitdem zahlreiche Social-Media-Nutzer zu Parodien von â€žWith Love, Meghanâ€œ. Kurzerhand werden BlÃ¼tenblÃ¤tter jetzt Ã¼ber alles gestreut â€“ auch auf das Butterbrot. WÃ¤hrend eines Ã¶ffentlichen Auftritts in New York verteidigte Meghan ihre â€žmagischen Blumenstreuselâ€œ jetzt jedoch vehement.
Laut Meghan sind die getrockneten BlÃ¼ten mehr als nur Deko auf dem Teller
Beim â€žTime100â€œ-Gipfel bezeichnete Meghan Markle ihre vielfach kritisierten BlÃ¼tenstreusel als eine Art â€žAnalogieâ€œ, denn laut der Herzogin stehen die essbaren Blumen fÃ¼r mehr als nur Deko. â€žLasst uns Ã¼ber die Blumenstreusel redenâ€œ, erklÃ¤rte Meghan â€žThe Daily Beastâ€œ-Berichten zufolge im GesprÃ¤ch mit â€žTimeâ€œ-CEO Jessica Sibley, â€ždenn ich glaube es geht um die kleinen Momente der Freude, die so mÃ¼helos sind und einfach das kleine bisschen Magie erschaffen, nach dem wir uns alle in unserem Alltag sehnen.â€œ
Offenbar scheint Meghan also eine regelrechte Philosophie in ihren Blumenstreuseln zu sehen. Dass zahlreiche Social-Media-User anderer Meinung sind, interessiert die Ex-Schauspielerin dagegen nur wenig. Angesprochen auf die Parodien im Netz, entgegnete sie amÃ¼siert mit einem Zitat der Komikerin Tina Fey (54): â€žWenn du jemals anfÃ¤ngst zufrieden mit dir zu sein, gibt es dieses Ding namens Internet, da kannst du viele Menschen finden, die dich nicht mÃ¶gen.â€œ In Zukunft kÃ¶nnten Meghan Markle und Prinz Harry Ã¼brigens ihre Titel verlieren. Verwendete Quellen: thedailybeast.com, TikTok

author: Jennifer Emert
title: chevron-right
text: On Thursday, Aug. 1, sweltering heat and humidity in Upstate, South Carolina made doing much outside dreadful. The thermometer outside of the Spartanburg Community College Union Campus showed 95 degrees Fahrenheit just before 2:30 p.m. on Thursday. In Union, News 13 caught up with crews mowing the grass and weed-eating outside the old Union Oil Mill preparing the property for sale. While they were not going to let the heat stop their progress, they were taking plenty of breaks. WEATHER WARN DAYS AHEAD: HIGH HEAT INDEX, TEMPERATURES AT NEAR-RECORD LEVELS "With the rain we've had over the last couple of weeks, the grass has almost gotten out of control so the guys were just: 'Hey, let's get it done.' I was just like: 'We have to be careful making sure we hydrate, stay in some shade and just get some water kind of that the same time,'" said Andre Smith, property owner and partner. Crews hoped to finish the work before severe weather rolled in. HEAT SAFETY TIPS FOR PEOPLE AND PETS The work is part of the Union's redevelopment effort and includes plans to open a steakhouse restaurant in partnership with Trevor Booker, who played basketball at Clemson and in the NBA. Anyone interested in the Old Union Oil Mill property can contact Andre Smith at [this email](deeandre2700@gmail.com).
